name: Classic Rummy card game
description:
Popular card game with few rules and a lot of fun. A must for all Rummy lovers.

The object of the game is to dispose of all the cards in your hand by creating melds, which can either be sets, three or four cards of the same value and different colors, or runs, which are three or more cards of the same color in a sequence, e.g. 3456.

After the end of a game round, penalty points are counted on the basis of the remaining cards. The player with the least penalty after the 5th round is the winner of the game.


*** Disclaimer ***
* The game is intended for an adult audience.
* The game does not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.
* Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at "real money gambling".
